column1: Table 4-94:  PFC, HFC, SF6, NF3, and N2O Emissions from Electronics Manufacture[1] (MMT CO2 Eq.)
[1] An extremely small portion of emissions included in the totals for Electronics Manufacture are from the manufacturing of MEMS and photovoltaic cells.
[2] Emissions of N2O from semiconductor manufacturing are reported in the CRF under 2H3.
